summary: Cal and his family are driving to their new home in California and are terrorized by a motorcycle gang along the highway.
cast: Gerald McRaney|Jake Busey|John Cassini|Richard Edson|Carla Gugino|Elan Oberon|Marshall R. Teague|Robert Miranda|Gina Mastrogiacomo|Don McManus|Julia McNeal|Pete Antico|Peter Sherayko|Dawn Cody|Juan Antonio Devoto|Rorion Gracie|Robert Kotecki|Greg Lewis|Orestes Matacena|Sam Menning|Akio Mitamura|Jennifer Holliday Morrison|Beverly Nero|José Pérez|Todd Starks|Edward Stone
title: Jóvenes y rebeldes: Los motoristas del miedo
